successStory.title: üéØ Real Student Success
successStory.quote: This morning I got my score: L11, R11, W11, S8. I updated my Express Entry profile, got 520 points, and was drawn for PR the same day! Thank you, Masha, for your support and help üíñ
successStory.testimonial: I had a great experience preparing with Masha. She's patient, supportive, and always makes lessons useful and motivating. Her tips and practice materials really helped ‚Äî I felt confident and well-prepared on exam day. I'd definitely recommend her to anyone aiming for a strong CELPIP score!

about.title: Why Work With Me?
about.lead: I help Russian-speaking and Ukrainian immigrants pass CELPIP and improve their English with proven methods that get results. My students consistently improve their CLB levels because I focus on what actually works.

results.title: Results-Focused Teaching
results.description: Every lesson has a clear goal. You'll know exactly what you're learning and why.

feedback.title: Personalized Feedback
feedback.description: I identify your specific weak points and give you a clear plan to improve them.

journey.title: I Understand Your Journey
journey.description: I speak Ukrainian and Russian, and I know the specific challenges Russian-speaking and Ukrainian students face and what to focus on for faster improvement.

interview.title: Beyond the Test
interview.description: With my Cambridge Business English certification and HR experience in Canada, I help you prepare for job interviews and workplace communication.

tesol.title: TESOL Diploma
tesol.description: Canada - Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages

celpip.title: Official CELPIP Instructor
celpip.description: Certified to prepare students for Canadian immigration English tests

testimonials.title: What My Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from students I've helped

reviews.text: We've had about ten lessons so far, and my main goal is to prepare for the CELPIP English test. Masha has created an excellent study plan and helps me with my weak areas. She is always punctual, and I'm happy to continue learning with her. Her approach is organized and focused, which gives me confidence as I get closer to my test date.
reviews.author: Mariia

reviews.text: Masha is a great teacher, since I started learning with her I have seen my level of English improve, all the classes are very productive and practical. She is kind, patient and always in a great mood. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Viktoriia

reviews.text: Masha is a very professional tutor. While we are making conversations, she is also checking my English, immediately points out to me about my mistakes. She really cares about my progress in English and building my confidence in communication.
reviews.author: Ivanna
